revision.text:
'''Jeff Keane''' is the youngest son of [[Bil Keane]], and currently [[inker|inks]] and [[colorist|colors]] the [[print syndication|syndicated]] [[comic strip]] ''[[The Family Circus]]'', taking over these duties upon the death of Bil in 2011, although he had been working with his father on the comic since 1981.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.nytimes.com/2011/11/10/business/media/bil-keane-creator-of-the-family-circus-dies-at-89.html |title=Bil Keane, Creator of ‘The Family Circus,’ Dies at 89 |last=Hevesi |first=Dennis |publisher=New York Times |date=November 9, 2011 |access-date=August 15, 2018 |quote=Mr. Keane died at 89 on Tuesday at his home in Paradise Valley, Ariz., but the tradition will continue, said his son Jeff, who has been working with his father on the cartoon since 1981.}}</ref><ref name="USA">Murray Shugars, [http://www.army.mil/-news/2009/11/04/29843-cartoonists-visit-q-west-draw-stories-from-troops/index.html "Cartoonists visit Q-West, draw stories from troops"], Official Homepage of the United States Army, November 4, 2009</ref>
The character ''Jeffy'' from ''The Family Circus'' was based on Jeff when he was growing up. Jeff was a theater major in college, but gradually grew into the family business. He lives in [[Laguna Hills, California]], in the [[Laguna Hills, California#Nellie Gail Ranch|Nellie Gail Ranch]] community.<ref name="USA"/><ref>Dennis McClellan, [http://articles.latimes.com/1997-02-05/news/ls-25424_1_ivy-house "Drawn Together"], ''[[Los Angeles Times]]'', February 05, 1997</ref>
Keane was elected president of The [[National Cartoonists Society]] (NCS) for the 2007–2009 term.<ref>Alan Gardner, [http://dailycartoonist.com/index.php/2007/06/01/jeff-keane-elected-president-of-national-cartoonist-society/ "Jeff Keane elected president of National Cartoonist Society"], ''The Daily Cartoonist'', June 1, 2007</ref> He was re-elected president for the 2009-2011 term.
At the 2015 [[Reuben Award]]s, Keane received the Silver T-Square Award for "outstanding service" to the cartooning profession.<ref>{{cite news|url=https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/comic-riffs/wp/2015/01/29/ncs-reuben-awards-family-circus-jeff-keane-to-receive-silver-t-square-award-i-will-not-be-asking-for-a-recount/?noredirect=on&utm_term=.27eaf32818cf|title=NCS REUBEN AWARDS: ‘Family Circus’ ‘ Jeff Keane to receive Silver T-Square Award|last=Cavna|first=Michael|date=29 January 2015|publisher=Washington Post|accessdate=15 August 2018}}</ref>
